titleStmt.title: A declaration of His Excellency the Earle of Leven: concerning the rising of the Scotish army from the seige of the city of Hereford. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Leven, Alexander Leslie, Earl of, 1580?-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.B. for Robert Bostock at the Kings head in Pauls Churchyard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
